title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 53.8 - Restrictions on entrance of nonemployees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 53.8 - Restrictions on entrance of nonemployees

State Regulations

Any person not connected with the institution or designated
by law as an official visitor shall not be permitted to enter unless he can
show that he has proper business to transact or is provided with an official
pass or other proper authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
53.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
